oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Phyllis Hickerson Washington oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Washington, Phyllis Hickerson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oral history excerpts of Phyllis Hickerson Washington, who participated in MTSU's Upward Bound Program as a high school student. Washington shares her memories of the Upward Bound Program, campus life and race relations as an MTSU student, and her experiences as director of MTSU's Minority Affairs
1. MTSU Upward Bound program -- 2. Upward Bound's impact on Washington's life -- 3. Black Student Union during the 1970s
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High school students; College preparation programs; African American college students; Race relations; Middle Tennessee State University
